name: Say No To Goblin!
description:
A dumb little game created by my friends and me for Ludum Dare 50!

You were a simple cobbler, until one day, you were bitten by a horrid goblin!

You only have a short matter of time until you are fully transformed.

How long can you resist your gobliny urges?!

Music by my pal Soroush Mahdavi (Sushi)
